CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 2, 1959, page B2, reads: "Potentate's Ball - Pictured at the annual Potentate's Ball recently at Royal Ballroom are principals of Pittsburgh's Sahara Temple. Officers are, front row, fourth from left: Past Imperial Potentate Joseph Givens, Imperial Sports Director Marshall Johnson, Illustrious Potentate Harry Keen, Imperial Potentate Booker Alexander of Detroit, and Assistant Imperial Promotional Director John Goggins. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Shriners wearing tuxedos, chain collars, and Sahara Temple No. 2 fezzes, including, front row, fourth from left: Past Imperial Potentate Joseph Givens, Imperial Sports Director Marshall Johnson, Illustrious Potentate Harry Keen, Imperial Potentate Booker Alexander, and Assistant Imperial Promotional Director John Goggins, gathered for the Potentate's Ball at Royal Ballroom for the Pittsburgh's Sahara Temple, another version
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Ancient Arabic Order of the Nobles of the Mystic Shrine for North America.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Givens, Joseph.Johnson, Marshall.Keen, Harry.Alexander, Booker.Goggins, John.
